svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.div:
• Variants below threshold contribute real signal (polygenic gap)
• Clumping arbitrarily picks one variant from each LD block
• Information from correlated variants is lost, not aggregated

switch.text: • Variants below threshold contribute real signal (polygenic gap)...
